short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to download the lectures in Radboud / brightspace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Small snippet to download the audio from Radboud University Brightspace lessons. Files are downloaded as .TS, you will need something like VLC to play them. 
There are some small glitches in audio
